4.eng-name: The Book on the Day of Friday
4.ara-name: كِتَاب الْجُمُعَةِ عَنْ رَسُولِ اللَّهِ صَلَّى اللَّهُ عَلَيْهِ وَسَلَّمَ

hadiths.text: Ibn Umar narrated:"The Prophet would give the Khutbah next to the trunk of a date palm. When he [the Prophet] began using the Minbar the trunk cried out for him until he came to it and held it, so it became quiet

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي الْخُطْبَةِ عَلَى الْمِنْبَرِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About The Khutbah On the Minbar
